steps.content: Use descriptive language to wow potential matches. Your prompt answers show people what kind of person you are and can be a great tool to advertise your thoughtfulness. steps.content: Put your own spin on classic answers. If you pursue Hinge long enough, you‚Äôre bound to see a few ‚Äúsimple pleasures‚Äù over and over again: drinking coffee, sunsets, watching Netflix, etc. While there‚Äôs nothing wrong with these answers, adding a clever twist can make your profile pop. steps.content: Show off what‚Äôs unique about you. The best way to attract someone is by being your authentic self‚Äîand there are things about you that make you like no one else. steps.content: Spice up your prompts with something a little sensual. steps.title: Play with word choice and punctuation to make your answers art.
steps.content: Play with word choice and punctuation to make your answers art. Since you have to write three separate prompts, Hinge gives you room to experiment in your expression. Draw people in by treating your prompts like poems and getting creative with punctuation, meter, and word choice. Ice cutting-cheek tears in the bright sun, move back behind my ears, settling in the hollows of head-meets-neck. Sunlight. Long, long sunlight hitting the window across the street and doubling back into that dark, open, unlit space in the east facing parlor. steps.title: Write about activities people may want to do with you.
steps.content: Write about activities people may want to do with you. A great prompt gets someone to think, ‚ÄúWow, I‚Äôve never met someone like that,‚Äù as well as, ‚ÄúWow, we have so much in common!‚Äù Write about activities you enjoy that encourage people to comment, ‚ÄúOkay, so when are we doing this üëÄ‚Äù on your prompt. steps.title: Show off your values and character.
steps.content: Show off your values and character. People often want to be with someone they share values with.
